statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -10 \\ 0 \\ 10 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 15 \\ 0 \\ -15 \\ -9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 23 \\ 1 \\ -24 \\ -13 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
